snippet.title: Crossing The Sands - Pre-Release Gameplay - Forgotten City
snippet.description:
Pre-release gameplay demo of Crossing The Sands, a first-person dungeon crawler with turn-based combat currently available to wishlist on Steam at https://store.steampowered.com/app/2505100/Crossing_The_Sands/

In this video, the party recharges their mana before exploring the ruins of the Forgotten City east of the Grand City.

Recorded on April 6, 2024, just under two weeks away from release. There is still some final polish being done before the scheduled release on April 19, 2024.

Soundtrack by Bloodless Mushroom.
